Books about Persia in English and books in Farsi


These are some resources I have gathered about Iran over the past few years.  Books in Farsi and about Persia in English.  I do not recommend all as beneficial reading (e.g. the quran) but they are needed for research into this culture.
I do not recommend all of these books and but will provide them here for the benefit of the public.
